Annotate vertical boxes at anchors of BEDPE elements

Source: R/bb_annoBedpeAnchors.R
bb_annoBedpeAnchors.Rd

Annotate vertical boxes at anchors of BEDPE elements

bb_annoBedpeAnchors(
  plot,
  fill = "lightgrey",
  linecolor = NA,
  alpha = 0.4,
  x,
  y,
  height,
  just = c("left", "top"),
  default.units = "inches",
  params = NULL
)

Arguments

plot

BEDPE plot object from bb_plotBedpe or bb_plotBedpeArches with which to highlight the anchors of BEDPE elements.
fill

Character value specifying fill color of highlight boxes. Default value is fill = "lightgrey".
linecolor

Character value specifying linecolor of highlight boxes. Default value is linecolor = NA.
alpha

Numeric value specifying fill transparency. Default value is alpha = 0.4.
x

A numeric or unit object specifying x-location of annotation.
y

A numeric or unit object specifying y-location of annotation.
height

A numeric or unit object specifying height of annotation.
just

Justification of annotation relative to its (x, y) location. If there are two values, the first value specifies horizontal justification and the second value specifies vertical justification. Possible string values are: "left", "right", "centre", "center", "bottom", and "top". Default value is just = c("left", "top").
default.units

A string indicating the default units to use if x, y, or height are only given as numerics. Default value is default.units = "inches".
params

An optional bb_assembly object containing relevant function parameters.

Value

Returns a bb_bedpeAnchor object with relevant genomic region, placement, and grob information.

Examples

## Load BEDPE data
data("bb_bedpeData")

## Create BentoBox page
bb_pageCreate(width = 4, height = 2.5, default.units = "inches")


## Plot and place a BEDPE arches plot
bedpeArches <- bb_plotBedpeArches(data = bb_bedpeData, chrom = "chr21",
                                  chromstart = 28000000, chromend = 30300000,
                                  linecolor = "black",
                                  x = 0.5, y = 0.5, width = 3, height = 1,
                                  just = c("left", "top"), default.units = "inches")

#> bb_arches[bb_arches1]

## Annotate genome label
bb_annoGenomeLabel(plot = bedpeArches, x = 0.5, y = 1.5, just = c("left", "top"))

#> bb_genomeLabel[bb_genomeLabel1]

## Annotate anchors
bb_annoBedpeAnchors(plot = bedpeArches, fill = "steel blue",
                    x = 0.5, y = 1.7, height = 0.5, default.units = "inches")

#> bb_bedpeAnchor[bb_bedpeAnchor1]

## Hide page guides
bb_pageGuideHide()
